alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 3:18AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...VERY WINDY CONDITIONS WILL CONTINUE FOR THE BORDEAUX AREA EARLY THIS MORNING... West winds between 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 55 MPH early this morning are expected to slowly decrease by sunrise Saturday. Although wind gusts should remain between 50 to 55 MPH, a brief gust of 60 MPH is possible along Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 70 and 75. Those traveling in light weight and high profile vehicles are urged to use caution along Interstate 25 between Chugwater and Wheatland early this morning.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
